alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 2:15PM CDT until June 14 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL WEBSTER...NORTHWESTERN JACKSON...WEST CENTRAL UNION...CLAIBORNE...NORTHEASTERN BIENVILLE AND LINCOLN PARISHES... At 215 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Homer, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ruston, Grambling, Homer, Arcadia, Bernice, Dubach, Simsboro, Vienna, Athens, Lisbon, Holly Springs, Antioch, Mount Zion, Aycock, Spring Lake, Lake Clairborne, Corinth, Shiloh and Unionville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing destructive winds and large damaging hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
